name: A swirling eyeball of the Lavaworm
data: It decreases the users strength pitifully.
It decreases the users dexterity pitifully.
It increases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It has negative armour class for its type (negative in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
The mist inside the eyeball swirls rapidly making it hard to focus at.
